title: The Country doctor
brief_description: Melodrama about a doctor who despite the pleas of his wife, puts his very ill neighbour ahead of his sick daughter who has suddenly taken a turn for the worse. Cast includes Kate Bruce, Adele DeGarde, Gladys Egan, Rose King, Florence Lawrence, Mary Pickford, Frank Powell. Silent film with English intertitles.
